languages.text: As soon as the Vizsier reaches 9 stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him to restore all his AP and MP and to gain the {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}idol of bloodrites{/g} effect until the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Upon reaching 9 stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Bloodstained{/g} this creature can use this ability to become {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}Icon of Blood{/g} for the duration of its turn.

As soon as the Vizsier reaches 9 stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him to gain the {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}icon of bloodserving{/g} effect until the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: As soon as the Vizsier reaches 9 stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him to gain the {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}idol of bloodrites{/g} effect until the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. After using this ability, Vizsier restores his AP and MP, and resets his attack cooldowns.
languages.translation_comment:
DLC-1. Глава IV. Локация DeathCultTemple.
Ульта. На 1 раунд накладывает на себя бафф. Используется самой первой абилкой. Становится доступна, если на мастере культа >9 стаков Bloodsoaked. Снимает все текущие стаки Bloodsoaked.

traits.locale_text: As soon as the Vizsier reaches 9 stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him to gain the {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}idol of bloodrites{/g} effect until the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. After using this ability, Vizsier restores his AP and MP, and resets his attack cooldowns.

languages.text: Когда Висирь набирает 9 уровней {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g}, эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} позволяет ему восстановить все ОД и ОП и получить эффект {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}кровавый кумир{/g} до конца его {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Vizsier reaches 9 stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him to restore all his AP and MP and to gain the {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}idol of bloodrites{/g} effect until the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда Висирь набирает 9 уровней {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g}, эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} позволяет ему восстановить все ОД и ОП и получить эффект {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}кровавый кумир{/g} до конца его {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Когда Висирь набирает 9 уровней {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g}, эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} позволяет ему восстановить все ОД и ОП и получить эффект {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}кровавый кумир{/g} до конца его {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

languages.text: En cuanto el Visir alcance 9 acumulaciones de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g}, esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} le permite recuperar todos sus PA y PM además de concederle el efecto {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}ídolo de rituales de sangre{/g} hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Vizsier reaches 9 stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him to restore all his AP and MP and to gain the {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}idol of bloodrites{/g} effect until the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto el Visir alcance 9 acumulaciones de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecido por la sangre{/g}, esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} le permite recuperar todos sus PA y PM además de concederle el efecto {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}ídolo de rituales de sangre{/g} hasta el final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: ヴィジールが{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}の9スタックに達するとすぐに、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}は、ターン終了時まで、彼のすべてのAPとMPを回復し、{g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}ブラッドライツの偶像{/g}の効果を {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終わりまで得ることができます。
languages.original_text: As soon as the Vizsier reaches 9 stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him to restore all his AP and MP and to gain the {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}idol of bloodrites{/g} effect until the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ヴィジールが{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}の9スタックに達するとすぐに、この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}は、ターン終了時まで、彼のすべてのAPとMPを回復し、{g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}ブラッドライツの偶像{/g}の効果を {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の終わりまで得ることができます。

languages.text: 当宿老拥有9层{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果时，此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}会恢复所有行动点数与移动点数，同时使其获得{g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}血祭神像{/g}效果，持续至宿老的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。
languages.original_text: As soon as the Vizsier reaches 9 stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him to restore all his AP and MP and to gain the {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}idol of bloodrites{/g} effect until the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当宿老拥有9层{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果时，此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}会恢复所有行动点数与移动点数，同时使其获得{g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}血祭神像{/g}效果，持续至宿老的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束为止。

languages.text: Erreicht der Wesir 9 Stapel {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}, kann er mit dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} seine gesamten AP und BP wiederherstellen und erhält bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} es den Effekt {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}Götze der Blutriten{/g}.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Vizsier reaches 9 stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him to restore all his AP and MP and to gain the {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}idol of bloodrites{/g} effect until the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Erreicht der Wesir 9 Stapel {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}, kann er mit dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} seine gesamten AP und BP wiederherstellen und erhält bis zum Ende seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}es den Effekt {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}Götze der Blutriten{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque le vizir atteint 9 cumuls de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g}, cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} lui permet de restaurer tous ses PA et ses PD, et lui confère l'effet {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}Idole des rites de sang{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Vizsier reaches 9 stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him to restore all his AP and MP and to gain the {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}idol of bloodrites{/g} effect until the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le vizir atteint 9 cumuls de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g}, cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} lui permet de restaurer tous ses PA et ses PD, et lui confère l'effet {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}Idole des rites de sang{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

Lorsque le vizir atteint 9 cumuls de {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g}, cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} lui permet de restaurer tous ses PA et ses PD, et lui confère l'effet {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}Idole des rites de sang{/g} jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

languages.text: Vezir, 9 {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}kanla vaftiz{/g} birikimine ulaştığında bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} etkinleşerek tüm EP ve HP'sini tazeler; {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}kan ayini mabudu{/g} etkisini kazanır. Bu etki, Vezir'in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: As soon as the Vizsier reaches 9 stacks of {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g}, this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} allows him to restore all his AP and MP and to gain the {g|f:4da45a2d9f6f41048afa8c7d9398e7b2}idol of bloodrites{/g} effect until the end of his {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
